fields.title: Bookstore Certificate ($25)
fields.short_description: $25 UH Bookstore Gift Certificate for the individual with the highest number of points at the end of Round 1.
fields.long_description:
Books, notebooks, magazines, art supplies, computers... you name it, the UH Bookstore's got it. With this gift certificate you'll be able to pick something up that you need (or maybe just want!).

This $25 gift certificate goes to the individual across all four towers with the highest point total at the end of Round 1.

fields.title: Bookstore Certificate ($5)
fields.short_description: $5 UH Bookstore Gift Certificate for the individual who earns the most points in each lounge during the week of Round 1.
fields.long_description: Books, notebooks, magazines, art supplies, computers... you name it, the UH Bookstore's got it. With this gift certificate you'll be able to pick something up that you need (or maybe just want!).\r\n\r\nTo win this $5 gift certificate, you must earn more points than any other person in your lounge during the week of Round 1.

fields.title: Mochi Ice Cream Party
fields.short_description: Mochi Ice Cream Party by Bubbies for lounge that consumes the least amount of energy usage during the week of Round 1.
fields.long_description:
Imagine a harmonious combination of creamy gourmet ice cream wrapped in a sweetened rice confection, all resulting in a delectable bite-sized, one and a quarter ounce ball of happiness. As the lounge with the lowest energy usage for this round, you'll snack out on a selection of Bubbies Mochi Ice Cream balls.

To win this prize, your lounge must consume less energy than any other lounge across all four towers during the week of Round 1.

fields.title: Cupcake Extravaganza
fields.short_description: Cupcakes by Hokulani Bakery for the lounge that earns the most points during the week of Round 1.
fields.long_description:
Many people believe Hokulani bakes Honolulu's best selection of cupcakes: carrot cake, coconut, snicker doodle, lilikoi, red velvet guava, vanilla, even lychee (when in season)! 

To win this cupcake party, your lounge members must earn more points than any other lounge across all four towers during the week of Round 1.

fields.title: iPad
fields.short_description: iPad 2 for the individual with the greatest number of points across all four towers at the end of the Quest for the Kukui Cup.
fields.long_description:
Thin, light design. Fast A5 chip. FaceTime video calling. 10-hour battery. It's not a tablet, it's iPad 2

To win this iPad, you must earn more points than any other individual in all four towers during the three weeks of the Quest for the Kukui Cup.

fields.title: Yogurtland ($5)
fields.short_description: $5 Yogurtland Gift Certificate for the individual who earns the most points in each lounge during the week of Round 2.
fields.long_description: Use this gift certificate to score your very own at Yogurtland, or else use it on a down payment for a larger purchase!

fields.title: Pool Party
fields.short_description: Pool party for the lounge whose members earned the greatest number of points by the end of Round 2 of the Kukui Cup.
fields.long_description:
You did it!  As the lounge that earned the most points out of all four towers, you'll be attending a pool party. 

To win this pool party, your lounge must earn more points than any other lounge across all four towers by the end of Round 2.

fields.title: Energy Pizza Party
fields.short_description: Pizza party for the lounge with the lowest energy consumption over the entire Quest for the Kukui Cup.
fields.long_description:
You did it!  As the lounge that used the least energy out of all four towers, you'll be grinding on a selection of pizzas from one of Hawaii's best pizza parlors. 

To win this pizza party, your lounge must consume less energy than any other lounge across all four towers over the entire three weeks of the competition.

fields.title: Bookstore Certificate ($100)
fields.short_description: $100 UH Bookstore Gift Certificate for the individual with the highest number of points at the end of Round 3.
fields.long_description:
Books, notebooks, magazines, art supplies, computers... you name it, the UH Bookstore's got it. With this gift certificate you'll be able to pick something up that you need (or maybe just want!).

This $100 gift certificate goes to the individual across all four towers with the highest point total at the end of Round 3.

fields.title: Milano Freezer Card
fields.short_description: $5 Milano Freezer Gift Card for the individual who earns the most points in each lounge during the week of Round 3.
fields.long_description:
Milano Freezer in Manoa Marketplace specializes in high quality gelato, yogurt, and smoothies with all the freshest ingredients. Everything is made in the store daily and there is a wide variety of flavors.

To win this $5 gift certificate, you must earn more points than any other person in your lounge during the week of Round 3.

fields.title: Malasada Madness
fields.short_description: Malasadas for the lounge whose members earned the greatest number of points by the end of Round 3 of the Kukui Cup.
fields.long_description:
Malasadas are Hawaii's favorite doughnut, and Leonard's Bakery has been perfecting the malasada since 1952.

To win this malasada party, your lounge members must consume less energy than any other lounge across all four towers during the week of Round 3.

fields.title: Mochi Party
fields.short_description: Mochi Ice Cream Party by Bubbies for lounge that consumes the least amount of energy usage during the week of Round 3.
fields.long_description: Imagine a harmonious combination of creamy gourmet ice cream wrapped in a sweetened rice confection, all resulting in a delectable bite-sized, one and a quarter ounce ball of happiness. As the lounge with the lowest energy usage for this round, you'll snack out on a selection of Bubbies Mochi Ice Cream balls.\r\n\r\nTo win this prize, your lounge must consume less energy than any other lounge across all four towers during the week of Round 3.

fields.long_description: For the individual with the highest number of points at the end of Round 4.
